name: Scribble Pal
description:
Scribble Pal is a tiny yet useful utility, especially made for designers using FigJam (or Figma, unofficially) on iPad with Apple Pencil.


This plugin allows you to create new stickies with text, as well as modify text on a selected sticky, shape or text box. The large text writing area works with either a keyboard or Apple Pencil with Scribble enabled.


New: Use "Set Anchor" on an existing sticky, shape or text box to set it as the origin point for additional stickies you want to add.


Important Note: Updating text in stickies and shapes with mixed styles (e.g. multiple fonts, underline) will remove all prior formatting.
